original: Par1.57cd/ sarve te narakaṃ yānti kāka.yoniṃ vrajanti ca //
analyzed: sarve te narakam yānti kāka yonim vrajanti ca

original: Par1.58ab/ pāpo vā yadi caṇḍālo vipraghnaḥ pitṛg.ghātakaḥ /
analyzed: pāpaḥ vā yadi caṇḍālaḥ vipra ghnaḥ pitṛ ghātakaḥ

original: Par1.59ab/ yo veṣṭita.śirā bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte dakṣiṇā.mukhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ veṣṭita śirāḥ bhuṅkte yaḥ bhuṅkte dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ

original: Par1.59cd/ vāma.pāde karaṃ nyasya tad vai rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate //
analyzed: vāma pāde karam nyasya tat vai rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate

original: (BI:tarpitās tena te sarve rudhireṇa malena ca //
analyzed: bitarpitāḥ tena te sarve rudhireṇa malena ca
no sūtra on vyavahāra only parāśara mādhava
